name: Beacon Application Services Corporation
description:
Beacon Application Services Corporation is a leading integrator of Oracle PeopleSoft Enterprise application software. With nearly 300 successful implementation and upgrade projects since 1992, Beacon has developed an outstanding reputation for customer satisfaction. 

Beacon also provides a suite of Testing and Change Management Tools for PeopleSoft. Headquartered in Framingham, Massachusetts, Beacon has over 100 Certified Consultants nationwide specializing in PeopleSoft applications, including Human Capital Management, Financials and Supply Chain.
